getAllNodes() - Static method in class object.Node
Method used to grab the list of all the nodes.
getAngle(Point, Point) - Method in class graphics.ProblemGraphGraphicsComponent
Fetches relative angle between two point where 3 O'Clock is 0 and 12 O'Clock is 270 degrees, currently unused untill affineTransformations is implemented
getCommandNumber(String) - Method in class graphics.CustomActionListener
Used to make readability easier by return a number for a switch
getConnection(Node, Node) - Method in class graphics.CustomActionListener
Gets the connection that contains both nodes passed in.
getConnectionFromID(int) - Static method in class object.Connection
Returns the connection which matches the input id.
getConnectionList() - Method in class object.Graph
Returns the connectionList of the graph that called the method.
getConnectionsContaining(ArrayList<Node>) - Static method in class object.Connection
Method used to get a list of connections that are joint to a list of nodes, this is used in Primm's to see all connections that are able to be considered.
getConnectionsContaining(Node) - Static method in class object.Connection
Returns the connection that contains the node n

getEdgeFromID(int) - Static method in class object.Edge

getID() - Method in class object.Edge
Method used to get the ID of the edge that called it.

getLowestConnection(ArrayList<Connection>) - Static method in class processing.Primms
Returns the lowest weight connection from the list passed in
getMinConnection(Graph) - Static method in class processing.Primms
The method to actually get a solutionGraph using the primms algorithm.
getMinGap() - Static method in class graphics.ProblemGraphGraphicsComponent
Get minimum gap between nodes
getNode(int) - Method in class object.Connection
Method to get either node one or node two, works by return the node at index 0 if 1 is passed, and the node at index 1 if 2 is passed.
getNodeFromLabel(String) - Static method in class object.Node
Method to get a node object based off its label
getPoint() - Method in class object.Node
Method used to get the co-ordinates of the node.
getSaveDetails() - Method in class object.Connection
Used in saving, gets all the details that are saved in the correct order as a string[], in the format CONNECTION_ID Node1Label Node2Label EdgeID
getSaveDetails() - Method in class object.Edge
Get the details of the edge in the save format used by the program
getSaveDetails() - Method in class object.Node
Used in saving, gets all the details that are saved in the correct order as a string[], in the format Node_Label x y
getStepButton() - Method in class graphics.ProblemGraphPanel
Currently unused, will use when implementing stepped problem solving.

getTolerance() - Static method in class graphics.ProblemGraphGraphicsComponent
Get node tolerance ( the error in pixels the user can make)
getTotalWeight() - Method in class object.Graph
Method that gets the total weight of the graph that called it.
getWeight() - Method in class object.Edge
Method used to get the weight of the edge that called it.
Graph - Class in object
A Graph is an array List of connects, as it is essentially a set of connections that are all joined.
Graph() - Constructor for class object.Graph
Empty constructor
Graph(ArrayList<Connection>) - Constructor for class object.Graph
Default constructor, used when creating a new tree
Graph(String[]) - Constructor for class object.Graph
Constructor used when creating previous graphs from a save, saved details are strings full of integers with spaces between them, the integers represent the connectionID.
graphics - package graphics
 
graphList - Static variable in class object.Graph
A dynamic list of all the graphs in the problem.
